name: Microwave Samsung ME83KRW-2/BW (ME83KRW-2/BW)
origAbout: All Samsung microwave ovens use a BIOCeramic camera coating. This material is environmentally friendly and easy to clean. It is 10 times more scratch resistant than, for example, stainless steel. In addition, the BIOceramic coating has another useful property - the material prevents the growth of bacteria by 99.9%. Triple Distribution System warms food evenly from pizza to glass of milk.
